The WEBstaurant Store > Concession Supplies > Condiments > Condiment Portion Control Packs > French Dressing 12 Gram Portion Packet 200/CS
French Dressing 12 Gram Portion Packet 200/CS
0" 0" See Image Comment
| |
Ideal for fast food restaurants or takeout
Lower costs with portion control
No refrigeration necessary
Details Nutrition Kosher Certifications
Keep customers happy with a rich and creamy French dressing in a 12 gram portion control packet. This French dressing portion control packet is a quick and easy way for any restaurant that offers take-out or on the go meals, to add to profitable menu items like salads. These portion control French dressing packets come in cases of 200, 12 grams per packet.
Download a PDF of Diamond Crystal's Kosher Certifications Here!
